original_text: Now Naomi had a relative on her husband’s side, a man of standing from the clan of Elimelek, whose name was Boaz.
korean_text: 나오미의 남편 엘리멜렉의 친족으로 유력한 자가 있으니 그의 이름은 보아스더라

sentences.original_text: Now Naomi had a relative on her husband's side
a man of standing from the clan of Elimelek
